title: Ice Knife

Level 1 Conjuration Spell

1d10Piercing +2d6Cold

Throw a shard of ice that deals 1∼10 Piercing damage. It explodes and deals 2∼12 Cold damage to anyone nearby creating an ice surface.

This spell can be cast while you are Silenced.

On Miss: The shard of ice still explodes.

2m 18m DEX Save Attack Roll

Ice Knife is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Ice Knife is a Lv 1 Spell from the Conjuration School. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflicting Status Ailments, buffing Characters, or interacting with the environment.

Ice Knife Information

Description: Throw a shard of ice that deals 1∼10 Piercing damage. It explodes and deals 2∼12 Cold damage to anyone nearby creating an ice surface. This spell can be cast while you are Silenced. Level: Lv 1 Spell School: Conjuration School Casting Time: 2 Turns Range: 2m18m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: DEX Save

How to Acquire Ice Knife

Ice Knife can be acquired by the following classes: Druid, Sorcerer, Wizard, Arcane Trickster Ice Knife can be cast by using the following Items: Frost Prince

Druid, Sorcerer, Wizard, Arcane Trickster

Ice Knife Tips & Notes

Upcast: Cast as a 2nd Level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 Cold for each spell slot level above 1st. A target with the Wet status is Vulnerable to Cold/Lightning damage and will sustain double damage from this spell. Ice Surface: Difficult Terrain - Halved Movement. May fall Prone if failing a DEX Save. The damage itself of this spell is an Attack Roll targeting Armour Class, while the Prone condition is a DEX Save.
